nodes.name: setQuestOutcome

params.entryFee: Amount to pay in DBETs for quest entry
params.prize: Prize in DBETs to payout to winners
params.timeToComplete: Maximum time for user to complete quest

payForQuest(bytes32,address).return: Whether the quest was paid for

addQuest(bytes32,uint256,uint256,uint256.notice: Allows an admin to add a quest

setQuestOutcome(bytes32,address,uint8).notice: Allows the platform to set the quest outcome for a user playing a quest and pays out the user/Decent.bet
